title: UCLA cancels in-person classes following apparent mass shooting threat by former lecturer - KTLA Los Angeles
content:
1. UCLA cancels in-person classes following apparent mass shooting threat by former lecturer  KTLA Los Angeles
  2. UCLA Reverts To Remote Learning Following Threats From Former Instructor  CBS Los Angeles
  3. UCLA department cancels in-person classes after apparent mass shooting threat: report  Fox News
  4. Former UCLA lecturer appears to threaten mass shooting  Los Angeles Times
  5. The person who made threats that moved UCLA classes online for a day is in custody, the university says  CNN

description: UCLA canceled all in-person classes Tuesday after a former lecturer apparently emailed threats to members of the school community and posted a video online that referenced a mass shooting. The formâ€¦
